scripts.build:all: yarn run build:js && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:pkg
scripts.build:js: yarn run build:mjs && yarn run build:umd
scripts.build:mjs: MODULE_ENV=production yarn run build:babel; rm -rf ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/mjs; mv ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/src ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/mjs
scripts.build:umd: MODULE_ENV=umd yarn run build:babel; rm -rf ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/umd; mv ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/src ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/umd
scripts.build:types: rm tsconfig.tsbuildinfo; tsc --emitDeclarationOnly; cp -r ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/src/* ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/umd/; cp -r ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/src/* ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/mjs/; cp -r ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/umd/* ../../build/packages/$NPM_PACKAGE/src/
